title: Offensive words still censored
content:
Ok guys and gals...

For some bloody reason, my profanity filter is engaged for voice to text when I obviously dont want it to be.

I have "unchecked" the offensive words on Settings > System > Languages & Input > Virtual Keyboard > Gboard > Voice Typing > Offline speech recognition > Hide offensive words (unchecked)

(I even tried turning off offline speech recognition, deleting english, and reinstalling)

Regular typing? No worries...
Glide typing? Plenty of profanity available...

Its just the voice to text
category: Google Assistant and Voice Actions, Google Pixel 2
